thread.title: Subscribe to Good Housekeeping for only £3

author: The Telegraph
title: Subscribe to Good Housekeeping for only £3
text: Good Housekeeping is packed with articles and tips covering food, fashion, beauty, health advice, plus home and garden ideas. It’s brimming with real-life stories, as well as the acclaimed Good Housekeeping Institute’s Tried, Tested and Trusted recipes and reviews. Subscribe today and get: - The best-selling lifestyle magazine delivered straight to your door - Life stories, delicious, Triple-Tested recipes, fashion, beauty, home and garden ideas - Save over £22 throughout the year - Subscriber only exclusives How to claim: Click here to subscribe to Good Housekeeping today for only £3 telegraph.co.uk Follow @telegraph
